text: Thore Johannes Wålberg (born August 19, 1953) is a Norwegian ice hockey player. He was born in Oslo, Norway and represented the club IF Frisk Asker. He played for the Norwegian national ice hockey team, and participated at the Winter Olympics in 1972 and 1980. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Ice hockey players at the 1972 Winter Olympics Category:Ice hockey players at the 1980 Winter Olympics Category:Norwegian ice hockey players Category:Olympic ice hockey players of Norway Category:Sportspeople from Oslo
title: Thore Wålberg
